mapper.insert: insert into competition values(seq_cid.nextval, #{cTitle}, #{cContent}, #{cPhone}, #{cAddress}, default, #{cStartDate}, #{cDueDate}, sysdate, sysdate, default, #{cWriter})
insert into cattachment values(seq_cpid.nextval, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, sysdate, seq_cid.currval)
